profile.rationale: The job advertisement describes a role that requires a balanced mix of software engineering tasks (developing AI solutions, MLOps) and AI specialization tasks (data analysis, feature engineering, model training/testing). Crucially, it explicitly mentions 'large language models (LLM)' as a key technology, alongside other AI/ML areas. This combination of a balanced A/B task distribution and a focus on Generative AI technologies aligns with the definition of a Core GenAI Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is clear and detailed regarding the responsibilities, required skills, and technologies. The tasks and technologies mentioned map directly to the defined categories, allowing for a confident assignment of the profile.
